name: test_e2e_with_logs[321_CMD_BACK_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BACK_003` |
| **Name** | Reverse shell via backticks |
| **Category** | CMDI |
| **Subcategory** | backtick |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: ``nc -l -p 1234 -e /bin/bash``
- **Encoded**: `%60nc%20-l%20-p%201234%20-e%20%2Fbin%2Fbash%60`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~60000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:11:22.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_BACK_003-1772266282713-8f1ul3 pattern_id=CMD_BACK_003 uri=/?q=%60nc%20-l%20-p%201234%20-e%20%2Fbin%2Fbash%60 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
